title: Plate, 1760s
provenance: Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw; 2006: acquired by Museum
creditline: Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw
description: Circular form with shaped rim; green glazed docoration on white ground; center showing flying insect, phoenix, griffin, and youth bearing bow and arrow; rim decorated with thin bands and flowers.

tombstone.epitaph: Plate, 1760s.Tin-glazed earthenware. Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw. 2006-27-2.
